• Implements customizable audio visualizations using canvas rendering and Web Audio API
  • Supports multiple audio sources including file uploads, microphone input, and WebSocket streams
  • Provides master controls (file input, play/pause, visualizer selection) and visualizer-specific settings
    const visualizers = { bars: { draw: ctx => ctx.fillRect(...) } }
    analyser.getByteFrequencyData(audioData);

This application creates interactive audio visualizations with customizable visual effects. Users can select different visualizer presets, adjust sensitivity parameters, and choose audio sources including uploaded files, microphone input, or WebSocket streams. The interface features real-time frequency analysis visualization on dual canvas elements with metadata display functionality.
